channel.title: Project Sapphire, Ruby, and Emerald (Source and Client)
channel.description:
Wassup people, I have decided to release my project that I have been working on whilst my internet wasn't working, so yeah, here they are. PLEASE NOTE: All 3 of these projects were made in the space of 2 days, so may be a little bit shabby.
The first project is Sapphire. Picture: [img]http://i378.photobucket.com/albums/oo230/MyBakky/evolved0001.png[/img] Download Link: http://uppit.com/v/CTS6ZQJ3 It comes with the source and client, and is [s]44.8MB[/s] NOW only [u]20.2MB[/u]! (Cleaned it Up ;)) Features: Custom Items Custom made home 100% working stats Very Stable. Agility hood + cape trimmed and untrimmed WORKING with emote!
The second project is Emerald. Picture: [img]http://i378.photobucket.com/albums/oo230/MyBakky/Projectemerald.jpg[/img] Download Link: http://uppit.com/v/VSCAY3DF It comes with the source and client, and is only 5.87MB Features: Very small for a Client + Source. 138 max combat level (Admins+) 100% working stats WORKS WITH SILAB CLIENT
The third project is Ruby. Picture: [img]http://i378.photobucket.com/albums/oo230/MyBakky/projectruby.jpg[/img]. Download Link: http://uppit.com/v/VEDJAFQV It comes with the source and client, and is only 5.93MB Custom built home. Added + Working fight pits Added + Working Teleports Added Working Prayer (prayer sucked before -.-) Added Ancients Added better shops Deleted unwanted objects
I hope you enjoy these projects, all three are open, but give me some credits.
If you do not download I will hump your grandmother. :D
- I3itcher

item.title: Project Sapphire, Ruby, and Emerald (Source and Client)
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

[quote=“reverce, post:13, topic:284757”]WOW this deserves a p–
this is realy bad,…

[quote author=I3itcher link=topic=381911.msg2875657#msg2875657 date=1248029130]

i quit becous - Because | well afther - after | one year of learning coding to host a big server , i was getting bored , maybe i wil - will | restard - restart | later in the future , but for now i yust - Wtf is this meant to mean? | take some rest

And…

haha ur so funny?

haha your so fail?

  1. get a life
  2. Ok u may speak english for 100% THINk UR HARD? I SPEAK english , french,dutch,and germent ,
  3. i can code , go release somthing
    4.serious …

Tell me to release something? try looking at this asshole.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,376332.0.html
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,307977.0.html
[/quote]i’am the asshole ?
THE GUY who has made this is an asshole.
Lets discus .
Custom Items = copy models , copy class 8. no knowleg. Needed.
Picture one shops ; knowledg. must be able to click mouse 2 times, go to tuts and understand it (in your case maybe hard).
100% working stats == Its not possible to have 100% working stats on an rsps —> i checked , this part is failed.
Agility hood + cape trimmed and untrimmed WORKING with emote! ----> nice but not your work how i proof? there are soucres with the same emote but released ages before you did.
It comes with the source and client, and is 44.8MB NOW only 20.2MB! (Cleaned it Up Wink) ----> wow??
What did you do?
Added + Working fight pits —> idk that one but probly was bin made long time ago.
Added + Working Teleports----> the teleports has always worked(f)
Added Working Prayer (prayer sucked before -.-) ----> WOW??(fl)
Added Ancients-----> no u didn’t(f)
Added better shops-----> woah, finaly somthing u did for 100%,(nicejob)
WORKS WITH SILAB CLIENT —> well silab servers suppose to be able opend with the silab client… (fail) (unneedet information)

WHERE ARE THE CREDITS??
I’am sure the part u codet is about 5-8% that means 92 % credits for other peeps.

If you do not download I will hump your grandmother----> So u think that is funny?

Deleted unwanted objects.
Gratz total dawnloads? :: 58 times ( look at uppit) posted June 21
Mine posted july 14 i have atm 500+ dawnloads SO now i think the peaps are more intressted In my work then in yours becous actualy u did nothing…
hmm, normy i dont post when i dont like , but u asked for it.
These are facts. u shoud’nt try to act like ur a pro in other Topics.
try to be nice , and peeps wil be nice 2 you 2 …
serious think before u post somone else topic.[/quote]
There was no need to grave dig it, its almost a month old…

Read full topic

@I3itcher wrote:

Wassup people, I have decided to release my project that I have been working on whilst my internet wasn’t working, so yeah, here they are.
PLEASE NOTE: All 3 of these projects were made in the space of 2 days, so may be a little bit shabby.

The first project is Sapphire.

Features:
Custom Items
Custom made home
100% working stats
Very Stable.
Agility hood + cape trimmed and untrimmed WORKING with emote!

The second project is Emerald.
Picture:
Download Link: http://uppit.com/v/VSCAY3DF
It comes with the source and client, and is only 5.87MB
Features:
Very small for a Client + Source.
138 max combat level (Admins+)
100% working stats
WORKS WITH SILAB CLIENT

The third project is Ruby.

Custom built home.
Added + Working fight pits
Added + Working Teleports
Added Working Prayer (prayer sucked before -.-)

Added better shops

I hope you enjoy these projects, all three are open, but give me some credits.
